请输入权限名称: Please enter the name of the permission
是否要删除这条记录，所有的子权限以及关联的角色权限将会失效，是否继续？: Whether to delete this record. All the sub-permissions and the associated role permissions will become invalid. Whether to continue?
是否要禁用当前角色，禁用后，该角色下的所有用户将会被踢出？: Whether to disable the current role. After disabling, all users under this role will be kicked out?
是否要启用当前角色，用户需要重新登录后，才会生效。: Whether to enable the current role, it will take effect only after the user needs to log in again.
是否删除改角色，与之关联的用户、权限关联将会删除。: Whether to delete this role, and the associated users and permission associations will be deleted.
权限名称不能为空: The permission name cannot be empty.
